TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but it's because you two were the only users aside from an overzealous moderator who completely changes you comments to always be agreeable to one another without your knowledge.

I wish I could have a more consistent sleep schedule.

grante' ; you just meet tse tse, but hey ; hey ... .. . now you know what"s tse tse no mean 'i' at zll . .. ...

i wish thing coulp be the same ever and ever and ever & ever a gain(s)[theÃ‚Â§a]{z} ***sick***

Edited August 7, 2015 by WinkAllKerb''

Your wish is so badly created, that it does nothing.

I wish i had super perception.

Granted. The immensity of all you now can understand is so much that you can do nothing but curl in to the fetal position, screaming at the agony of your insignificance.

I wish I had a deeper voice.

Granted. Infrasound.

Although I have an unnaturally deep voice, I wish I could reach at least a low F. All I can do is A.

Granted. It causes sore throat for two days every time you speak lower then low A.

I wish for free unlimited EVE: Online access for myself.

Granted. The price goes waaaaaay up for everyone else, so no one but you plays it.

I wish that I could gain energy from photosynthesis, as well as eating food.

granted,but you get poisoned while gaining energy

I wish i had SRB fuel

Granted, and it's burning.

I wish I could interact with a single neutrino.

Granted. But nothing happens.

I wish i was 19 years old.

Granted: But you now have the worst and most painful case of Acne ever Recorded on the planet Earth.

I wish for this to be post #11111.

Edited August 9, 2015 by Admiral-Helwyr
change "comment" to "post"

Granted. It's post #9001.

I wish to drift.

Granted. You drift off road and off a bridge.

I wish I could make the necessary noises to speak in biotronics.

Granted, but that's ALL,you can speak so noone else,understands a word,you say.

I wish xan and i could meet each other in person.

Granted, but having never met before in person you guys pass by without ever recognizing each other.

I wish I had a pet roomba.

Granted. But since i misheard you, its Arumba, and he minmaxes you (2 points for people who understood that)

I wish i could speak kerbal fluently.

Granted, but you can only speak it backwards...

I wish I could speak fluent Spanish.

granted, but its the only language u can speak now

i wish my minmus base didnt forced my fps to freeze at 25

Granted. It forces it to freeze at 2 FPS.

I wish for more Chciken colors.

granted, now 'Chciken' also dominated the world

i wish all computers in the world were lag free

Granted. Now they are all plagued by registry bugs.

I wish for rof hsiw I

granted detnarg

i wish i could communicate with birds

Granted. You become the arch nemesis of birdking.

I wish for doves.

Granted

I wish i had the ability to shift into any bird

Granted. You turn into a dinosaur and are captured.

I wish to turn into a cat, so as to kill birds.
